# Overview

To showcase some of the work previous students have done, and as
inspiration of future projects, below you can find links to a few past projects. They are of course posted with permission from the students.


-   *Plastic in the Urban Freshwater Environment* by [Amelia
    Foley](https://ameliafoley.github.io/AMELIAFOLEY-MADA-portfolio/) -
    [main report](/files/projectexamples/Foley_Report.html), [supplement
    file](/files/projectexamples/Foley_Supplement.html), [GitHub project
    repository](https://github.com/ameliafoley/AmeliaFoley-MADA-project).

-   *Predicting Federal Emergency Management Agency Funding for U.S.
    Disasters* by [Morgan
    Taylor](https://morganataylor.github.io/MorganTaylor-MADA-portfolio/index.html) -
    [main report](/files/projectexamples/Taylor_Report.html), [supplement
    file](/files/projectexamples/Taylor_Supplement.html), [GitHub project
    repository](https://github.com/morganataylor/MorganTaylor-MADA-project).
